sentences.sentence: His wanderlust would not allow him to stay long in one spot.
sentences.translation: 他酷爱旅游，无法在一个地方久留。

sentences.sentence: When we met, you warned me of your wanderlust.
sentences.translation: 但我们相遇之时，你就警告我说你有漫游癖。

sentences.sentence: Now they roam the Earth, following an insatiable wanderlust.
sentences.translation: 现在他们漫游地球，跟随一个永不知足的旅行热潮。
